title: Connect Four game with built in AI Opponent
description: Connect Four terminal game with an AI opponent made with the Minimax algorithm with Alpha-Beta pruning

title: Custom Unix Shell
description: I built a custom Unix style shell in C that allows users to run system commands and includes several built in commands like cd, pwd, echo, and exit. The shell reads and parses user input, searches the system PATH to find executable programs, and runs them using child processes. To make the project more engaging, I added a terminal-based animation using ncurses that runs when the shell starts and can be triggered again with a custom command. This project helped me better understand how command-line shells work behind the scenes, including process creation, input handling, and interacting directly with the operating system.
